Perceptor:

"No torture show for Perceptor"singhed the male while he started to 
sent other encoded message that said"As soon as, she's ready may I 
have to honor to tell it to his husband, master?... "


He said that when he went to a lab, then he tied up Nightlight in a 
talbe and started to prepare the reprogramation.








--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
>  Hydras brought up one of his tails and took the kick while the 
second tail 
> slashed at his back like a whip. He sent a coeded message to 
perceptor, "Don't 
> waste time with interogation all that matters is she is converted 
to a 
> predacon..she will be more useful to us that way. It will drive 
Rodimus 
> insane..and that is one advantage we can not let slip by."
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: Heh, and you know that I can bring a lot more, 
Hydras.
> > Rodimus goes for a roundhouse kick on the Predacon Commander.
> >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Hydras was hit in the right fire wing. 
Flames shot 
> > and and he tumbles to the 
> > ground making a small crater. He flipped up and stared Rodimus 
down, "Enjoying 
> > our little rumble Rodimus...you haven't seen anything yet!"
> > > 
> > > OOC: Ok, here is the repost.
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus crashes into the ground from Hydras' throw. Rodimus 
does a kickup, 
> > > returning to his feet. He fires three of his wrist mounted 
photon lasers at 
> > > Hydras' head.
> > >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:OOC: Hydras is in the air lol repost :)
> > > > 
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > Rodimus was slammed to the ground by Hydras. It didn't keep 
him out long. 
> > > > Rodimus tries to sweep Hydras' legs out.
> > > >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:OOC:where is nightlight now?
> > > > 
> > > > Hydras sot upwards when hesaw rodimus flip missing 
Carnatron's shots. he 
> > > > grabbes rodimus's foot and threw him towards the ground.
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > As Hydras launches his shoulder blasters, Rodimus jumps up 
performing a 
> > > front 
> > > > > flip. Hydras' shots strike the ground below. Carnations's 
shots also pass 
> > by 
> > > > > heading for Hydras' body. As Rodimus completes the flip, 
he extends his 
> > > body, 
> > > > > his feet about to come down on Hydras' head.
> > > > >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Hydras takes the kick to the 
stomach and 
> > caused 
> > > > him 
> > > > > to stumble back a few 
> > > > > feet. . He sent a roar and fired his shoulder cannons at 
Rodimus.
> > > > > Carnatron while Rodimus was distracted transformed into 
Prime and fired 
> > the 
> > > > > big gun twice at his back.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > Rodimus tries to jump off of Carnation. The spikes cause 
some damage to 
> > > his 
> > > > > arms 
> > > > > > and legs.
> > > > > > Hydras blade strikes his spoiler, slowing the swing long 
enough for 
> > > Rodimus 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > send a thrust kick his way.
> > > > > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:As Aerotaur dropped 
straight in 
> > his 
> > > > > line 
> > > > > > of fire, Owlhawk expression
> > > > > > soured faster than it had ever taken for Starscream to 
scheme
> > > > > > something up.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > As his ally dropped to the ground, he decided to take 
things personal.
> > > > > > He pushed himself forward and hurled himself at the spy 
with the speed
> > > > > > and force of a meteor, ready to throw a punch.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Owlhawk: Windlord! Try to stabilize him enough for me to 
attend him!
> > > > > > That was no ordinary weapon!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > > >
